storyInfo: Amiya manages to draw on the knowledge of the Black Crown to delay Priestess. Communication with the Doctor is restored. The first priority is to overcome the crisis that Priestess and PRTS have brought.

attributes.content: Kal'tsit has disappeared from your vision, before you even have a chance to process what has happened.
The only thing left on the deck is a jacket.
(Pained wail)
attributes.name: Mon3tr

attributes.content: Next, Mon3tr's massive frame begins to contract, shrinking into a black, crystalline cocoon.
AMa-10 was one of my proud creations.
attributes.name: Priestess

attributes.content: This was not the result I had hoped for.
attributes.name: Priestess

attributes.options: She had a name.;Her name was Kal'tsit.

attributes.content: It had its own code name. I do not recognize any significance in the renaming.
attributes.name: Priestess

attributes.content: Priestess walks towards the cocoon on the deck.
Step back, Doctor! I must protect Mon3tr!
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Threads emerge from Amiya's staff, attempting to stall Priestess's steps.
But Originium continues to grow from the ground in strange angles, assimilating Amiya's Arts.
You can tell that Amiya is struggling.
Priestess, whose powers seem impossible to resist, and Kal'tsit's only legacy—
You want to save it?
attributes.name: Priestess

attributes.content: I want to fix it too.
attributes.name: Priestess

attributes.content: Not only does AMa-10 carry our hopes, it has also preserved a record that is very important to me.
attributes.name: Priestess

attributes.content: You have yet to recover from the shock.
You do not even have the luxury of sorrow in the face of the threat before you.
What will Priestess do next? How should you protect Amiya?
Priestess apparently notices your thought process—
Why... are you afraid of me, Dr. {@nickname}?
attributes.name: Priestess

attributes.content: She approaches you.
The Originium spreading under your feet has immobilized you and Amiya.
You see her up close for the first time.

attributes.options: Just what are you trying to do?!

attributes.content: ...I'm trying to protect you.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Just like what I promised to do.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: I promised to protect both you and Amiya.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Until the moment you breathe your last breath, Doctor. That's my responsibility.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: But I will never stop hating you. I am in no position to educate or criticize Rosmontis. After all, I might not be able to hold myself back from taking revenge.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: There was a similar scenery and a similar conversation. There were different emotions during different eras. All of which are working together to bridge that large gap in your memories.
What... did you just remember?
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: 'Priestess'.
No. This time, you remembered her first. You remembered Kal'tsit.
The physician whom you trusted so deeply still seems to be here.
You recall searching for the clues Kal'tsit left behind in Civilight Eterna...
You recall the words Kal'tsit left for you, when all the links are connected—
'I never forgot.'
(Whispering in unknown language) No matter where in this vast universe you came from, I bid you to witness the beacons we left behind, remnants of a civilization now gone to eternal rest.
attributes.name: Oracle

attributes.content: (Whispering in unknown language) Perhaps it will be our blessing... and the final gift of hope.
attributes.name: Oracle

attributes.content: You are certain that those eyes now see you, across the vast reaches of time.
Formulas?!
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Dr. Kal'tsit mentioned that it reduces the loss of meta-information during transmission through special mediums...
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.options: Obstruct the transmission of information through Originium!

attributes.content: What should I do?
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: There is no time to hesitate, Amiya acts.
Once again, you share your thoughts with Amiya. All the memories of your researches come back to you.
Relying on intuition and prior research, you begin to decipher the formulas, convert, then reverse...
You understand that it will not be completely effective. But you must pray that it works—
For Kal'tsit.

attributes.options: Remember the things in my mind, Amiya!

attributes.content: Got it, Doctor!
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Just weave it in my Arts, as Logos taught me—
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Then—
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: STOP!
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Shockwaves from Amiya's Arts repel the Originium that surrounds you.
This is...?
attributes.name: Priestess

attributes.content: The Originium attempting to trap you again is unable to progress any further. Amiya's silhouette is reflected on the countless crystalline surfaces.
I'm trying to hold on—
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: But the Originium is pressing in even faster now...
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: I... I need to work harder! I can do it!
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Amiya's eyes are resolute. You can't help but feel worried for her.
You do not understand the powers that you are toying with.
attributes.name: Priestess

attributes.content: It seems my Arts aren't just stopping them, it's also detecting her status...
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: She's not as invincible as I thought—
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Indeed, I've been roused too soon. The rate at which Originium has assimilated this planet falls below my expectations.
attributes.name: Priestess

attributes.content: In addition, the reckless behavior of those two Terrans have prevented me from utilizing Originium as I planned...
attributes.name: Priestess

attributes.content: But that does not mean you can change the inevitable with your clumsy usage of our technology.
attributes.name: Priestess

attributes.content: Pink threads fly out from Amiya's staff, dancing in the space enclosed by Originium.
But you sense that Amiya is facing tremendous pressure.
And Priestess's figure has become completely obstructed by Originium...
You can see Priestess's eyes in every Originium fragment, every facet.
It is as though...
Theresa is teaching me how to cast these new Arts more efficiently, Doctor!
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: I think I've weakened Priestess's control over Originium. I should be able to delay her—
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: As Amiya's Arts run wild, you hear a reassuring voice in your head.
Doctor, Amiya, we're in the Abyss. The Originium interference was weakened for a moment.
attributes.name: Mantra

attributes.content: It was...
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Raidian has reestablished communications, but the situation is rough. I can barely use my Arts to help Raidian maintain the link.
attributes.name: Mantra

attributes.content: Also, she can not detect Dr. Kal'tsit's biosignal.
attributes.name: Mantra

attributes.content: Where are you? What's the situation?
attributes.name: Mantra

attributes.options: We're on the deck of Rhodes Island!

attributes.content: You heard the Doctor.
attributes.name: Warfarin

attributes.content: Don't worry, Lancet-2 will help monitor your status.
attributes.name: Warfarin

attributes.content: I will not let you down, Dr. Warfarin!
attributes.name: Lancet-2

attributes.content: Once you're out of the ship, establish an isolation zone around the ship according to Kal'tsit's original plan. Don't let any of those things get out!
attributes.name: Warfarin

attributes.content: You are not coming with us, Dr. Warfarin?
attributes.name: Lancet-2

attributes.content: My patients are still here. I'll lead their evacuation myself.
attributes.name: Warfarin

attributes.content: Don't worry about me.
attributes.name: Warfarin

attributes.content: (Why am I not hearing from you, Kal'tsit?)
attributes.name: Warfarin

attributes.content: I'm working on it! Give me some time!
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: More importantly, once PRTS is shut down, its core data must be downloaded—
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: Kal'tsit has set up a backdoor.
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: It will be the key to eliminating the threat, once and for all.
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: Mechanist acknowledges.
attributes.name: Mantra

attributes.content: We are moving through the Abyss.
attributes.name: Mantra

attributes.content: Counting on you!
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: Is Kal'tsit hurt, Doctor?
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: Why am I not hearing from her?
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.options: Amiya and I will fight to the bitter end.

attributes.content: <p=1>Inside the Abyss</><p=2>At the same time</>
attributes.name: group_location_stamp

attributes.content: We have restored communications with the Doctor.
attributes.name: Raidian

attributes.content: We stick to the plan.
attributes.name: Raidian

attributes.content: I'm not detecting any more enemies.
attributes.name: Rosmontis

attributes.content: Nor any new data transmission from the PRTS core.
attributes.name: Raidian

attributes.content: It's too quiet.
attributes.name: Logos

attributes.content: Location of the core, Raidian?
attributes.name: Ascalon

attributes.content: Here you go.
attributes.name: Raidian

attributes.content: Continue to push towards the core and attempt to deactivate it.
attributes.name: Ascalon

attributes.content: I'll take point! PRTS will definitely come up with new waves of enemies to meet us.
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: I'll take charge of analyzing the core.
attributes.name: Mechanist

attributes.content: 'Aurora.'
attributes.name: Logos

attributes.content: This little light will guide our way—
attributes.name: Logos

attributes.content: What is it, Logos?
attributes.name: Mechanist

attributes.content: This is not my light...
attributes.name: Logos

attributes.content: A rhombus-shaped halo hangs in the darkness, swaying gently.
It is like a cold eye, gazing upon all present.
Alert...
attributes.name: Ascalon

attributes.content: Is this the 'Priestess' that Dr. Kal'tsit was talking about?
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: I don't think so.
attributes.name: Raidian

attributes.content: I just detected a large amount of haphazard but familiar signals.
attributes.name: Raidian

attributes.content: They come from Rhodes Island itself.
attributes.name: Raidian

attributes.content: What... is this?
attributes.name: Misery

attributes.content: A massive machine emerges in the endless white noise—
All present are familiar with the components that make up its frame.
Closure has often showed off the parts that she used to modify Rhodes Island's modules. Some of them were made by the elite operators themselves.
PRTS has repurposed and weaponized Rhodes Island's facilities.
attributes.name: Touch

attributes.content: But where did they come from? They weren't supposed to be in the Abyss...
attributes.name: Touch

attributes.content: Originium.
attributes.name: Ascalon

attributes.content: Originium shards scatter irregularly across the unusual machine.
No longer do they simply consume; now, they are creating.
Are you telling me Originium can recreate the stuff that's on Rhodes Island?
attributes.name: Misery

attributes.content: Logos is reminded of the tower in the Assimilated Universe, and of 'her'.
It's not that simple.
attributes.name: Logos

attributes.content: PRTS does not have the capability to decode Originium data. Someone else is intervening.
attributes.name: Logos

attributes.content: Priestess.
attributes.name: Ascalon

attributes.content: Its data is connected to the core of PRTS in a way that I can't understand. These things are different from the Originium entities that we faced!
attributes.name: Raidian

attributes.content: Looks like we're in for a fight.
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: I see no other way.
attributes.name: Stormeye

attributes.content: Ready?
attributes.name: Stormeye

attributes.content: Ready.
attributes.name: Rosmontis

attributes.content: The rhombus-shaped eye glows even brighter.
Controlled by PRTS, the mimic machine charges up.

attributes.text: No target restrictions. Combat style analysis complete.
